lead_paragraph: Manager Claudio Ranieri has urged Leicester City to use their experience from two seasons ago, when the champions narrowly escaped relegation, after Saturday's 2-2 Premier League draw with Middlesbrough left them two points above the drop zone.

headline.print_headline: Ranieri Urges Leicester to Evoke Spirit of 'Great Escape'
headline.main: Ranieri Urges Leicester to Evoke Spirit of 'Great Escape'

snippet: Manager Claudio Ranieri has urged Leicester City to use their experience from two seasons ago, when the champions narrowly escaped relegation, after Saturday's 2-2 Premier League draw with Middlesbrough left them two points above the drop zone....
